title: "paper2"
description: |
  Reproducing graphs
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(patchwork)
library(ggplot2)
```

## read in data and clean the names
```{r}
trust <- read_csv(here("research_data", "trust.csv")) %>%
  clean_names()
```
## show names
```{r}
names(trust)
```
## convert response values to percentages (as per Table 3)
```{r}
trust %>%
  tabyl(experiment, response) %>%
  adorn_percentages()
```

```{r}
trust <- trust %>%
  mutate(agegroup = case_when(age_group_participants == 0 ~ "3-5 year olds", 
                              age_group_participants == 1 ~ "5-6 year olds"))
```

```{r}
trust_long <- trust %>%
  gather("condition_information", "response", -agegroup)
```


```{r}
ggplot(trust_long, aes(x = agegroup, y = response, fill = condition_information)) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge")
```
